What are the treatments for trichothiodystrophy ?,"These resources address the diagnosis or management of trichothiodystrophy:  - Genetic Testing Registry: BIDS brittle hair-impaired intellect-decreased fertility-short stature syndrome  - Genetic Testing Registry: Photosensitive trichothiodystrophy  - Genetic Testing Registry: Trichothiodystrophy, nonphotosensitive 1  - The Merck Manual Home Edition for Patients and Caregivers: Photosensitivity
